tk1707151555.title: Add Authentication and Authorization
tk1707151555.description: Implement secure user authentication and authorization to ensure only authorized users can access the dashboard.

subtasks.title: Read
Choose an authentication method (e.g., JWT, OAuth).
Implement user registration and login functionality.
Set up role-based access control (RBAC).
Ensure password security (e.g., hashing, salting).

tk1707333907.title: Create Frontend Design
tk1707333907.description: Design an appealing and user-friendly interface for the Kanban dashboard, providing intuitive user experience.

subtasks.title: Research UI/UX best practices.
Design wireframes/mockups for different dashboard views.
Get feedback from stakeholders on the design.
Implement responsive design principles.

tk1707333953.title: Develop Card Management Features:
tk1707333953.description: Implement features for creating, editing, and deleting cards on the Kanban board, including drag-and-drop functionality.

subtasks.title: Create UI components for adding/editing/deleting cards.
Implement drag-and-drop functionality using libraries like React DnD.
Add functionality for assigning cards to users.
Implement card filtering and sorting options.

tk1708110736.title: Implement Real-Time Updates
tk1708110736.description: Implement real-time update features to ensure all users can see changes to the Kanban board immediately without needing to refresh the page.

subtasks.title: Choose a real-time communication protocol (e.g., WebSockets, Server-Sent Events).
Implement server-side logic to broadcast updates to connected clients.
Update the frontend to listen for and handle real-time updates.
Test real-time functionality under various conditions (e.g., high load, network latency).

tk1708110943.title: Implement Responsive Design
tk1708110943.description: Ensure the Kanban dashboard works well on various screen sizes and devices by implementing responsive design.

subtasks.title: Use CSS media queries to adapt layouts for different screen sizes.
Test the dashboard on various devices and browsers.
Optimize images and other assets for faster loading on mobile devices.
Implement touch-friendly interactions for mobile users.

tk1708111055.title: Testing and Debugging
tk1708111055.description: Conduct comprehensive testing to ensure the Kanban dashboard functions smoothly, and debug any encountered errors or issues.

subtasks.title: Write unit tests for backend APIs and frontend components.
Conduct integration testing to ensure different parts of the system work together.
Perform user acceptance testing (UAT) with stakeholders.
Set up error logging and monitoring to track issues in production.

tk1708111212.title: Backend Development
tk1708111212.description: Develop backend functionality for the Kanban dashboard, including API endpoints and database integration.

subtasks.title: Set up the server environment and database.
Implement API endpoints for CRUD operations on cards and users.
Integrate authentication and authorization middleware.
Test API endpoints using Postman or similar tools.

tk1708111336.title: Frontend Development
tk1708111336.description: Develop frontend components and UI for the Kanban dashboard.

subtasks.title: Set up the project with a modern frontend framework (e.g., React, Vue.js).
Develop UI components for displaying cards and managing board interactions.
Implement responsive design to ensure compatibility with various devices.
Test UI components across different browsers and devices.

tk1708111488.title: Documentation
tk1708111488.description: Create documentation for the Kanban dashboard, including user guides and API references.

subtasks.title: Write user guides explaining how to use the dashboard.
Generate API documentation for backend endpoints.
Include troubleshooting tips and FAQs.
Review and update documentation regularly.

tk1708111489.title: Write Documentation
tk1708111489.description: Document the development process, architecture, and usage instructions for the Kanban dashboard to aid future maintenance and onboarding processes.

tk1708111555.title: Gather User Feedback
tk1708111555.description: Conduct user surveys or interviews to gather feedback on the usability and effectiveness of the Kanban dashboard.

subtasks.title: Feedback appointment

tk1708111612.title: Review Design Mockups
tk1708111612.description: Share design mockups with stakeholders and gather their feedback to ensure alignment with expectations and requirements.

tk1718110736.description: Implement real-time update features to ensure all users can see changes to the Kanban board immediately without needing to refresh the page.
